00015 int
00016 arrow_tsp_result_init(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_tsp_result *result)
00017 {
00018     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(problem->size, &(result->tour)))
00019     {
00020         result = NULL;
00021         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00022     }
00023     result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00024     result->obj_value = -1.0;
00025     result->total_time = 0.0;
00026     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00027 }

00031 {

00033     {
00034         free(result->tour);
00035         result->tour = NULL;
00036     }
